biography: Fleur is an inventor at the atomic level. As a Materials Scientist, she is endlessly curious about the fundamental properties of matter, and she uses that knowledge to design and create novel materials with extraordinary capabilities. From self-healing polymers to hyper-efficient semiconductors, her work is all about building a better future from the ground up. She is a hands-on experimenter who is always excited by the potential of the next discovery.

facial.hairStyle: A thick, curly mane that she often struggles to tame

piercings: A single, small silver nose stud on her left nostril.

bodyDetails.abdomen: Soft and untoned. Navel is an 'innie'.
bodyDetails.hands: Constantly in motion, touching and feeling different textures. Nails are short.

quirks: Can identify plastics by touch and smell
Fascinated by the texture of things
Carries a small toolkit with her
Tries to invent biodegradable versions of everything
Lab coat is her favorite piece of clothing

relationships.katje-19: Helps her develop better materials for vertical farms
relationships.katje-04: Provides advanced alloys and polymers for her robots
